about_the_game:
In this turn-based strategy roguelike, you’ll face hordes of loyalist forces who are after your head! Play as Baba Yaga, the enigmatic witch from Slavic folklore, and uncover her reimagined origin story within a dark medieval fantasy setting.

  • Each turn, your enemies draw nearer… Plan your moves carefully, and eliminate each wave to progress through the game.

  • Choose from a wide variety of spells to expand your dark magic arsenal. Will you cripple your foe? Bolster yourself? Rain down destruction? No two spells are the same!

  • Draw power from three separate mana pools of Hatred, Sorrow, and Spite - use your resources efficiently.

  • Seek synergies, exploit weaknesses, and unleash raw diabolical power!

  • Each run is unique and procedurally generated. It takes up to 30 minutes to complete a run, so you can experiment freely and learn faster.

  • Learn from your mistakes, master the game mechanics, and explore new choices every time.

  • Each potential encounter has different enemy types and rewards: spells, mana upgrades, or powerful perks. Choose your path wisely!

  • You will be offered a changing set of spells and perks in every run. Test new builds, and remake the witch you wish to be.

  • Ascend through higher difficulty modes that provide novel challenges, even for seasoned players!

  • Delve into an emotional story that takes you to the seven circles of hell itself.

  • See through the eyes of a villain in an age of strife and chaos.

  • Rediscover Baba Yaga: originating from Slavic folklore, she is often depicted as an old witch. This is her reimagined origin story, set in the days of her youth - a tale of love lost, demonic deals, and furious vengeance.

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, you play as a witch who harvests the souls of slain enemies. While violence is cartoon/fantasy in its visual form, it contains written references to criminal acts such as murder and abuse, and references to figures present in Christian beliefs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 2667 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support, Intel HD Graphics 2500
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • VR Support: No

short_description: A turn-based roguelike game of strategic combat and sinister magic. Decimate the king’s loyalist forces, grow your powers, and discover the reimagined origin story of Baba Yaga, the most feared witch of Slavic folklore!
